tool.name: Select taxa

param.name: cladeagenomes
param.label: Choose Genomes in Clade A
param.help: Select between two and fifteen (related) genomes for Clade A only. (You can select genomes for Clade B on the next screen.)

param.name: cladebgenomes
param.label: Choose Genomes in Clade B
param.help: Select between two and fifteen different genomes for Clade B.

tool.help:
This tool allows you to select genomes for both Clade A and Clade B in successive screens.
No fewer than two and no more than fifteen genomes may be selected for either clade.
